item.description:
This is a fundraiser... $45 for tix purchased online, $60 at the door [if tix available]

From the web site:

Early August is the perfect time to celebrate Rhode Island's farmers, food artisans, and chefs. The sun is out, the tomatoes are ripe, and everyone is taking advantage of our state's natural beauty.

This August, you won't want to miss the 2nd Annual Local Food Fest. Guests will enjoy delicious tastings cooked up by Rhode Island chefs, using Rhode Island's best fruits, veggies, meats, cheese, seafood and more. There will be samplings of Rhode Island wine and beer, plus a silent auction. All of this will take place in one of the most beautiful locations in the state, at Castle Hill Inn and Resort in Newport.

Find more info at:

http://www.farmfreshr...
item.name: RI Local Food Fest 2008
